author.bio: WPCampus is a community of web professionals, educators, and others dedicated to the growth of WordPress in higher education. Our mission is to advance colleges and universities by providing a support structure and wealth of knowledge for anyone who uses, or is interested in using, WordPress.

node.title: WPCampus 2021 Planning Survey
node.excerpt: Due to COVID, and the ongoing instability surrounding in-person events, WPCampus 2021 will be presented in an online format. We hope to be able to meet in New Orleans for...
node.content:
Due to COVID, and the ongoing instability surrounding in-person events, WPCampus 2021 will be presented in an online format. We hope to be able to meet in New Orleans for WPCampus 2022.

We are also looking to host our annual conference later in the year, as opposed to our usual mid-July timeframe.

Please help us make the best decisions for our community by answering the following questions. We are also looking for feedback regarding topics for the event.

The results of this survey will be shared with the community.

siteMetadata.siteName: WPCampus: Where WordPress meets higher education
